content.body: littledan: I think https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9042 might be of interest to you
content.formatted_body: littledan: I think https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9042 might be of interest to you

content.body: is there an existing idiom in ECMA-262 spec language for removing duplicates from a List?
for Sets etc we just avoid putting duplicates in the list in the first place
the usual idiom for which is like "If `list` does not contain `item`, add `item` to `list`"
content.formatted_body: the usual idiom for which is like "If list does not contain item, add item to list"

content.body: (Set.prototype.add is written in a slightly different style for... reasons)
if possible, doing deduplication up front is better yeah
